website_summaries.verdict: Additional cheddar flavor makes for very cheesy crackers, but not everyone loves this version.
pros: As part of their Flavor Blasted line, these crackers are covered in a cheesy, slightly zesty seasoning
Many kids are big fans of this version, but it seems most adults prefer the traditional varieties
They come in a large carton with a spout for easy sharing and pouring
cons: The seasoning makes them slightly messier than the regular line of flavors
The flavor appeals mostly to kids
Getting 6 cartons at once might be too much for some people

customer_reviews.title: Check the Expiry Date
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in July via subscribe and save. They arrived August 1. For some reason, the kids haven't been eating them lately. I decided to taste a few out of the new carton that I just opened, and they have zero flavor / bordering on stale. I checked the expiration date, and it is 9/8/19. At the store, the expiry is usually 2 years out. I basically had 39 days to go through 6 cartons, which is absolutely ridiculous. I have 3 cartons of goldfish that are about to go in the trash. I hate wasting money (which is why I chose subscribe and save) and feel so incredibly disappointed/frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Liani Torres

customer_reviews.title: So stale, like unedible
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely stale. Like, old tasking and hard and even shriveled. I would not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: LALALALA

customer_reviews.title: These crackers are really tasty, and were sent quickly.
customer_reviews.text: These crackers are really tasty, and were sent quickly. They came in a secure box, and were in good shape. We just ordered another box, and will be repeat and happy customers.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: But have you ever noticed that sometimes the goldfish in the cartons aren't shaped like regular goldfish
customer_reviews.text: First time they sent me regular cheddar instead of whole grain. Luckily people eat goldfish right up, I had no problem getting rid of them and just ordered a second case! Addicting little fishies. But have you ever noticed that sometimes the goldfish in the cartons aren't shaped like regular goldfish? They are all puffy and weird shaped or something instead of the flatter cracker type. Why?! There is a noticeable taste difference, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: I must have, i dont have to buy at the stores no more can have them shipped to my house now.
customer_reviews.author: Laroyaltieproduction

customer_reviews.title: Put these on subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: Once you go flavor blasted, you don't go back! Kids love these and one carton at the local grocery store is $8 so if you buy in here you can save. I wish they had these for subscribe and save :(.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn G

customer_reviews.title: Good for cocktail hour
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy these frequently with unsalted shelled roasted peanuts during our cocktail hour. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Marshall

customer_reviews.title: GMO Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Goldfish, but I've quit buying these after I read on the box that they contain GMO ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Craftergalore

customer_reviews.title: Lifesavers
customer_reviews.text: Our son would have starved some time ago without these. Super picky eater (medical reasons for this), and there are times these are literally the only thing he’ll go for. Plus he gets all the Omega-3s and fatty acids he needs. Pepperidge Farm we love you!
customer_reviews.author: Did I Buy That?

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: I eat a ton of goldfish so save a lot of money
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Not gone eat what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo the picture is flavor blasted, and I expected to get the flavor blasted but instead I got “whole grain cheddar”
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cinzio

customer_reviews.title: Good crunchy snack
customer_reviews.text: I have been folllowing a Keto and low carb diet recently, I have been missing crackers. I found these and I was pleasantly surprised. They remind me of Cheezits. A dry texture but good flavor and crunch!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa lowell

customer_reviews.title: Goldfish Crackers
customer_reviews.text: These are big cartons of sealed crackers which when used in soup were stale and soggy. The buyer would not give a return or refund . These taste like what happens with old cereal in milk.
customer_reviews.author: MaryM

customer_reviews.title: Great for nibbling all week
customer_reviews.text: If you love Goldfish crackers, you love this big package. Great for nibbling all week while reading and watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Extra Cheddar Blast
customer_reviews.text: Extra Cheddar Blast is NOT what I got... received plain old goldfish which is what I was looking forward to.l
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My kids love goldfish and this was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: They're goldfish, my daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: If you love goldfish you will love ordering and eating goldfish.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Great for goldfish addicts!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about mega flavoured goldfish in huge boxes!
customer_reviews.author: Scottydog

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Only got one box when it clearly says pack of six.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Invest now in Goldfish reserves!
customer_reviews.text: Invest now in Goldfish reserves! The goldfish futures are looking good. Act now and stock your pantry. Came crisp and delicious from NYC distribution
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love goldfish! This is a great deal for so many big cartons!
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Package came damaged to our doorstep
customer_reviews.text: We love this product but the box came damaged and several boxes were crushed
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Heater

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them
customer_reviews.text: These are the only crackers my picky sons will eat. I'm happy they have whole grain and can feel less guilty that they survive only on these and milk. They're l growing so the crackers may be ok. The birds and squirrels that get the spoils seem to enjoy them too.
customer_reviews.author: vlkswgndrvr

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Very good, very fresh. Bought them in October 2017. Expiration date is May of 2018. Grandkids love them.
customer_reviews.author: GaryH

customer_reviews.title: My kids go through these packs like water! I like that they're whole grain
customer_reviews.text: My kids go through these packs like water! I like that they're whole grain, so at least it's a somewhat healthy snack.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: In the words of Nacho Libre, “It’s the best! I love it!”
customer_reviews.text: I freaking LOVE whole grain goldfish. Regular goldfish? Nah. It gets stuck in my teeth. Whole grain goldfish? HECK YA. It doesn’t get stuck in my teeth and even tastes better, while having a better texture. Eating whole grain goldfish brings tears to my eyes. It’s as if God himself came down and gently touched my tastebuds with the perfect amount of salt and goldfish. It is truly the snack that smiles back.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceKaseJase

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these
customer_reviews.text: My kids are addicted to these goldfish! They like these more than the regular goldfish, but they are a little messier due to the "xtra cheddar". Other reviewers said they received regular goldfish, but we did indeed get the flavor blasted ones just as I ordered. These cost a lot more at the grocery store than on Amazon, plus I don't have to leave my house to receive them! Great for snack time for little and big kids alike!
customer_reviews.author: JW

product_meta.title: Pepperidge Farm Goldfish Flavor Blasted Xtra Cheddar Crackers, 30 oz. Carton (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Xtra Cheddar| Size:30 Ounce (Pack of 6)The Snack that Smiles Back: When it comes to Goldfish crackers, you can feel good about serving your favorite snacks. All of our cheese varieties, like our intense Xtra Cheddar Flavor Blasted Goldfish crackers, are baked with real cheese. Goldfish crackers are made with no artificial preservatives or flavors. The 30 oz. carton is also available in Cheddar Goldfish crackers, Cheddar Goldfish Colors, and Baked with Whole Grain Cheddar Goldfish - made with 12g of whole grain per serving. Everyone loves Goldfish crackers – they're tasty and fun! With a large 30 oz. carton you can always come back for more, or have enough to feed a crowd.
feature_bullets: Playful crackers baked with a smile
